channel.title: Temporary whitelist
channel.description:
I think we need to activate the whitelist until server integration so we can stop telenim (and any other griefer like him). The whitelist disconnects anyone not on the list so it's effective for banning him.
On the issue of whitelisting people, I need ideas.

lol just search his mc name in members list and he gets pwnt lol

item.title: Temporary whitelist
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Well at least this issue can be resolved quickly.

Read full topic

item.title: Temporary whitelist
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

LilXCj:

It may be easy to roll back but it isn’t easy to get back the items that he steals and drops at the same time. I don’t see a problem with whitelisting the server so that users will be forced to sign up with the forums and apply. It may be just one user, but it’s one user that’s causing a problem for a lot of people.

But whitelisting the server over one idiot is stupid, it limits the server growth and confines it to the current player base. You’re also acting as if telenim is the only person who uses xray, are you implying if somebody else used xray we should immediately add a whitelist? Many people use xray, but obviously don’t say anything.

Telenim has successfully earned himself to much attention, that he is seen as ‘special’. Just clearing this issue up, but as noobs are ftw said it’s already being integrated.

Read full topic

item.title: Temporary whitelist
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Si Force:

I don’t think we need to implement a whitelist so we can stop one user from being disruptive. If he wants to spend hours griefing and going to all the effort, let him, as we can just roll him back within 10 seconds.
